amendment.description: To regulate management contracts, require an Analysis of Alternatives for major acquisition of the Department of Defense and impose additional limitations on certain leases and charters.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1555 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1555 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To regulate management contracts, require an Analysis of Alternatives for major acquisition of the Department of Defense and impose additional limitations on certain leases and charters.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1555 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1555 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain.
